Rooms at the Petit Palace Museum feature a contemporary bathroom with a hydromassage shower and hairdryer. Bicycles can be hired for free at the Petit Palace, subject to availability. Bus tours can be organised for guests. The exclusive Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 200 metres away with its many shops, restaurants and bars. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy cocktails.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Pódium
description: Stay in one of Barcelona’s loveliest neighborhoods at the NH Collection Barcelona Pódium. Only steps away from the Arc de Triomf, the hotel enjoys a central location and is a short 15-minute walk to the luxury stores along Passeig de Gràcia and the bustling Las Ramblas. Stroll through the Parc de la Ciutadella or go there for an invigorating run. The Arc de Triomf metro and train station is right by the hotel, providing direct links to everything in the city. The harbor and zoo are also nearby. NH Collection Barcelona Pódium has 140 stylish rooms, some of which come with balconies. Each has its own Nespresso machine, a pillow menu and premium mattress for perfect sleep. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. For relaxation throughout the day, head to the rooftop pool or to the gym and sauna. A lavish breakfast with fresh delicacies including Catalan specialties is served daily. In the afternoons and evenings, choose between a contemporary Mediterranean restaurant or head to the rooftop tapas bar. In the winter, unwind with a drink at the ground-floor bar. For your special events or even for a wedding, reserve our spectacular terrace or one of the 8 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Alexandre Hotel Fira Congress
address: C/ de Jose Agustín Goytisolo, 9-11, 08908 L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Catalonia
description: This modern hotel in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as a free shuttle service and an executive floor. It features 4-star rooms with views of the city. This contemporary hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and a coffee bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Hotel Fira Congress Barcelona offers 160 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Also available are a mini bar, an in-room safe and slippers. Hotel Fira Congress Barcelona is within a 20-minute car trip of Barcelona El Prat Airport and La Rambla. Camp Nou, Placa de Catalunya and Palau de la Musica Catalana are only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Suizo
description: This hotel, located in the Gothic heart of Barcelona near the Cathedral, enjoys an ideal location for visiting the sights of this exciting city. Hotel Suizo has modern facilities and comfortable rooms with satellite television and air conditioning. Watch the world go by from the bedroom with a balcony overlooking the streets of Barcelona’s Gothic quarter, or relax in the Suizo’s lounge. Wander in the labyrinth of narrow streets surrounding the impressive Barcelona Cathedral, just 200 metres from the hotel. A short walk takes you to the famous Ramblas, with its colourful street performers and pavement cafés. Walk down to the old port or the beach, or take the metro to visit other areas of the city. A metro station next to the Hotel Suizo makes public transport connections easy.

name: Catalonia Roma
description: Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus. There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar. Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel. The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered. Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

name: Barcelona Princess
description: Situated in Barcelona, Hotel Barcelona Princess offers trendy 4-star accommodation, as well as a swimming pool and a sauna. It also provides free wireless internet. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can book tours and tickets. Hotel Barcelona Princess provides 363 air conditioned rooms. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to slippers and a hair dryer. Guests of Hotel Barcelona Princess are welcome to sample local cuisine at Restaurant N1, or try Mediterranean dishes at Restaurant Estrella. There is also a range of breakfast options available each day. Barcelona El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Selva de Mar Metro Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: INNSiDE By Meliá Barcelona Apolo
description: INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo is located at the foot of Montjuïc, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Ramblas. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with WiFi. Refurbished in 2017, the rooms at INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo feature smart décor and wooden floors. Each one has a flat-screen TV, minibar, work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast every morning. There is also a snack bar serving light meals in the evenings. Parallel Metro Station is next to the hotel, connecting you with the Fira Convention Centre in 2 stops.

name: Hcc Taber
description: Located just 8 minutes’ walk from central Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, Hotel HCC Taber is housed in an impressive Modernist building. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The rooms at HCC Taber feature satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. The building of the HCC Taber was originally designed by the famous Barcelona architect, Domènech i Montaner, who also designed the amazing Palau de la Música Catalana. It still retains its characteristic wrought-iron balconies and large bay windows. The hotel’s buffet breakfast offers a wide range of dishes, and there are à-la-carte breakfast options. There is also a snack bar and room service. The Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Gaudí’s iconic Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are also within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

name: AC Hotel Som by Marriott
description: The urban AC Hotel Som in Barcelona allows for easy access to the train and bus stations, and to the city centre. It features 102 naturally-lit comfortable and well-designed rooms which include thoughtful details like, safe, hairdryer and two different types of pillows. There is free WiFi Internet in all common areas of the hotel, in addition to on-site parking, a fitness center, and a meeting room with terrace. The hotel is near the airport and the city cruise port, thus, both business and leisure travellers alike can take advantage of visiting Fira Gran Vía, Barcelona's City of Justice, the Gran Vía 2 Shopping Centre, and the new 'Plaza de Europa' business area. Register Number: HB-004068.Marriott

name: Expo Hotel Barcelona
description: Hotel Expo Barcelona is located next to Barcelona Sants Station. Its rooftop pool and terrace offer fantastic city views and the modern rooms feature a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s stylish Stop’n’Bite restaurant serves international à la carte food. There is also a terrace bar in the rooftop chillout area, which provides views over Barcelona. The Expo Hotel has 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Bicycle hire is available to enjoy the city. Montjuïc Hill, where you can find the Joan Miró Museum and Barcelona’s Fira Congress Centre, is 10 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium is just one metro stop away.

name: Hotel Market
description: Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant. The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace. The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away. The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

name: Hcc Montblanc
description: Set in the Gothic Quarter and next to Urquinaona Metro Station, HCC Montblanc offers air-conditioned rooms, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and à la carte Mediterranean cuisine in El Racó del Montblanc restaurant. Close to the Born district, Hotel Montblanc Barcelona is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and 500 metres from Plaza de Catalunya. Palau de la Musica Concert Hall, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 250 metres away. City tour buses and direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop at Plaza Catalunya.

name: Capri by Fraser Barcelona
description: This motorcycle-friendly hotel is 3 Metro stops from Plaza Catalunya and 15 minutes’ walk from the Barcelona’s beaches. There is free WiFi available throughout. Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers chic air-conditioned and spacious suites and apartments with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette, a work desk and a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The property has a free self-service laundry room open 24 hours a day and a gym. For guests coming by motorcycle, Capri by Fraser offers free indoor parking with direct elevator to the rooms and a “pit stop” service including complete toolkit for small repairs and chain lubricant, free suede, helmet visor cleaner, battery charger and compressor to check the pressure level of tyres. Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers a buffet breakfast every day and a set menu at lunch time during week days. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk.

name: Wilson Boutique Hotel
description: Wilson Boutique Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views. The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants. The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many buses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel. The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 750 metres away.

name: Hotel Continental Barcelona
description: In the heart of Barcelona, the Hotel Continental Barcelona is located on Las Ramblas, next to Pl. CatalunyaThe Continental Barcelona offers 40 fully equipped rooms with: Fridge, Microwave, Charger for iPhone, Android and USB plug, Iron board, hairdryer, direct telephone, free high speed wifi, Safety box, HD Television with national and international channels, air conditioning with individual climate control, and tropical fan.We offer all our Guests very special amenitie. A free and 24/7 hours open buffet were to enjoy a drink, a coffee, a beer or some snacks.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Vilamari
description: Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath. The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season. Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

name: Catalonia Port
description: Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at the weekends, is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar. The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom. Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona
description: This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi. Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony. A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested. Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year. The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions. The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

name: AC Hotel Sants by Marriott
description: One of the best urban hotels in Barcelona, the AC Hotel Sants, is located near the Sants Train Station, the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre, and the Plaza de España. Our prime location provides easy access to MACBA - the contemporary arts museum, the Sagrada Familia Temple, the airport, and the city centre. The hotel’s location and the quality of its facilities make it an excellent choice for seminars, business meetings, and conventions. Each of the 78 guestrooms has a Wi-Fi Internet connection, and an in-room safe. Indulge in a relaxing moment at the AC Lounge and enjoy the varied menu which includes salads, Spanish tapas, main dishes and delicious desserts. Its magnificent location and its services make this hotel the perfect destination for business or leisure trips. Register Number: HB-004335.Marriott

name: Miramar Barcelona
description: Miramar Barcelona has a picturesque setting within gardens on Montjuïc Mountain, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers 2 swimming pools, free Wi-Fi and rooms with spectacular views of Barcelona. Housed in a former palace with a Neucentisme style, the hotel maintains many of the building’s original features and it is one of the symbols of the city. The interiors have chic, contemporary design. Guests can make use of the on-site fitness centre, or relax by the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The hotel's L´Occitane Spa features an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, pressure showers and treatment cabins. The hotel has 24-hour room service and a bar with a terrace. Studio Miramar restaurant serves a selection of Catalan and Mediterranean dishes. Each of the Miramar’s air-conditioned rooms has floor to ceiling windows, a 47-inch TV with international channels and a minibar with a courtesy bottle of water. Their private bathrooms come with L'Occitane toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and either a shower or a designer bath tub. The Joan Miró Foundation, the Old Port and the National Art Museum of Catalonia are within 20 minutes’ walk of the Miramar. And just 10 minutes walk from the Olympic Stadium and Palau Sant Jordi.

name: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
description: Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site. Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site. Barcelona's La Rambla is 300 metres from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 50 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Ciutat de Barcelona
description: Ciutat de Barcelona is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 100 metres from the Picasso Museum. It has an outdoor rooftop pool, and offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. Rooms at the Ciutat Barcelona Hotel are also heated and come with a work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and Pure eco toiletries. The hotel is centrally located. Jaume I Metro Station is just 300 metres away, and it is a 10-minute walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage.

name: Claris Hotel & Spa Gl
description: Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection. Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door. The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork. The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce. The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
address: Carrer De Beltran I Rozpide, 7, 08034 Barcelona
description: The elegant AC Hotel Victoria Suites features 66 beautiful and spacious rooms, some of them have a kitchenette upon request and the kitchenware is available also with an additional fee. The AC Hotel Victoria suites has an amazing terrace, a fitness center and parking onsite also boasts two well designed event rooms. The hotel is located in the Pedralbes residential quarter, next to the university area,at a walking distance from IESE, ESADE and 10 minutes walking from the Camp Nou, FC Barcelona Museum and CIMA Hospital. This location provides easy access to the Center of Barcelona, El Prat airport and the main train station. Santa Clara Restaurant is our onsite restaurant that offers our customers an exquisite Catalan and Basque culinary fusion. Wrapped in the creativity of the prestigious interior designer Jaime Beriestain, Santa Clara serves premium quality market products with honesty and passion delighting the most demanding palates.Marriott

name: Hotel Garbi Millenni
description: Hotel Millenni is a boutique hotel set 50 metres from Paral.lel Metro Station. It features a small roof terrace with a hot tub and impressive city views. All rooms are stylish and offer free Wi-Fi. Accommodation at the Millenni is brightly decorated. The climate-controlled rooms feature satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served daily and there are several traditional bars and restaurants in the surrounding Raval district. Guests can have access to the gym, the hot tub and the sauna. There are 2 computers which have internet access, as well as a small library with daily newspapers. There is also a lounge area where guests can watch the TV. The famous Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. The funicular train to Montjuïc Castle leaves from the nearby Metro station.

name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
description: Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area. Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection. A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

name: Catalonia Gran Via Bcn
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes 550, 08011 Barcelona
description: Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station. You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner. You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

name: Hotel Paxton Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona, 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel Paxton Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Hotel Paxton Barcelona include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via
description: This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble. Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries. A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby. Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries. Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

name: Zenit Borrell
description: Zenit Borrell is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 15 minutes’ walk from the stylish Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The Marés restaurant offers Mediterranean and international cuisine, and has an elegant outdoor terrace. There is also a bar with a large TV screen. All rooms at the Zenit Borrell have air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms come equipped with a hairdryer. The tour desk can provide useful information on Barcelona and the surrounding area. The hotel is 12 minutes from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas by metro, while the Hospital Clinic Metro Station and hospital are 200 metres way from the hotel.

name: H10 Urquinaona Plaza
description: Providing a rooftop terrace and a rooftop pool, H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel is a luxurious place to stay in Barcelona. It is conveniently located in the city centre. There are a range of amenities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. For families H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel offers babysitting/child services. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. For guests' comfort, all rooms at H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel are both soundproofed and air conditioned. All offer a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. Guests staying at the hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Located within walking distance of Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, H10 Urquinaona Plaza Hotel has friendly staff to provide useful tips on what to see in Barcelona. La Rambla and Placa de Catalunya are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Catalonia Plaza Catalunya
description: Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app. The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes. Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages. Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

name: Catalonia Portal de l'Angel
description: Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals. The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel. The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

name: Gallery Hotel
description: Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival. This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe. The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café. Gallery Hotel is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

name: Me Barcelona
description: Set in Barcelona and with Somorrostro Beach reachable within 2.7 km, ME Barcelona offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides nightclub and room service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. ME Barcelona features some units with city views, and each room comes with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available every morning at the property. At ME Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from ME Barcelona, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ohla Eixample
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service. Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available. The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar. Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request. Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

name: Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia
description: Within 50 metres of La Pedrera and Diagonal Metro Station, Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia features a terrace bar with panoramic views of Barcelona. This 4-star hotel also has an interior garden. Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia is set in a restored building with contemporary architecture. The smart bedrooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a bathroom with a rain-effect shower. Casa Batlló is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 2 stops from Diagonal Station. The Gràcia district is within a 5-minute walk, and charming street cafés can be found along the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, 200 metres away.

name: Hotel SB Icaria
description: Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace. Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya
address: Gran Via de Las Corts Catalanes, 629, 08010 Barcelona
description: At the Hotel Indigo® Barcelona Plaza Catalunya, a Four-Star Superior hotel, design and decor takes inspiration from the neighborhood’s architectural masterpieces. Take, for instance, our Gaudí-inspired lobby and guest room murals, and the patterned fabrics and artwork that showcase our community’s history. Outside our doors, it’s a short walk to the Gaudí original Casa Batlló as well as the cafes and street performers of La Rambla, the Temple de la Sagrada Familia, and countless shops and boutiques. At Indigo Barcelona Cocktail & Snack Bar, you may enjoy a drink or a snack after a day of exploring, also, our poolside terrace is perfect places to soak up the atmosphere over a glass of local cava.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grand Hotel Central
description: Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi. The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme. The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast. Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries. The Grand Central’s restaurant, Bistro Helena, serves innovative Catalan food. The trendy Sky Bar, on the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona. The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle. City WiFi devices are also available, allowing internet access outside the hotel. The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

name: AC Hotel Diagonal L'Illa by Marriott
description: The AC Hotel Diagonal L'Illa is a new boutique hotel in the city's business and shopping district. Located just a few steps away from top restaurants, shopping, and entertainment, our hotel offers travelers an upscale, modern and sophisticated option in Barcelona. With a European-style breakfast in the mornings and hand crafted cocktails at the AC Lounge in the evenings. This four-star hotel is surrounded by gardens and upscale boutiques, making it ideal for those who love city lifestyle and shopping. It stands within one of the most exclusive malls in Barcelona, just a few minutes walk from the Camp Nou Football Stadium and the Royal Palace of Pedralbes, with excellent connections to the city's historic centre. The AC Lounge with delicious light snacks, has beautiful panoramic views over Barcelona’s famous Diagonal avenue. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want. The ideal hotel for a great experience in Barcelona. Register Number: HB-003973.Marriott

name: Hotel Best Aranea
description: Showcasing impressive views of Barcelona, this 3-star hotel is a brief stroll from Girona Metro Station. It provides free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a rooftop terrace. This elegant hotel offers luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and a concierge. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a private bathroom. They all offer a desk, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. Those staying at Hotel Aranea can dine on Mediterranean cuisines at the in-house restaurant, ideally situated for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. There is a range of breakfast options to choose from each morning. Hotel Aranea is surrounded by the area's well-known tourist attractions, nightlife and shops, and Arc de Triomf is within walking distance. For guests travelling by car, parking is available and L'Hospitalet de Llobregat is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Acevi Villarroel
description: Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV. Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available for an extra charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace. Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

name: Olivia Plaza Hotel
description: Centrally located, Olivia Plaza Hotel allows for easy access to Barcelona's popular sightseeing and retail areas. It is within a 10-minute walk of Palau de la Musica Catalana, Barcelona Cathedral and La Rambla, and provides views of Placa de Catalunya. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to explore the best of the local nightlife. The rooms are air conditioned and include an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. They all have heating and a desk. Serving Spanish, Mediterranean and fusion cuisine, the on-site restaurant features an air-conditioned dining room along with an outdoor terrace. Room service is available 24 hours a day, and a wide selection of restaurants and cafés can also be found close by. Local attractions close to Olivia Plaza Hotel include the Picasso Museum and Passeig de Gracia. It is within a 20-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia Train Station, which allows easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa - Adults Only
description: The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too. Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs. The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows. The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

name: Arai Aparthotel
description: Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym with a sauna, and a rooftop terrace with city views. The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Speciality Monument status. Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona. Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 950 metres away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

name: Exe Campus
address: Vila Universitaria (Campus Uab)-08193 Cerdanyola Del Valles, Barcelona
description: Hotel Campus is located within the university campus in Cerdanyola del Valles, 25 minutes from the centre of Barcelona. The hotel has free WiFi. Rooms at the Campus are comfortable and functional. All rooms have a private bathroom, satellite TV and minibar. The Hotel Campus has 2 restaurants and a coffee bar. Guests can also use the catering facilities on offer at the neighbouring Barcelona Autònoma University. The Hotel Campus has free public parking, nearby. Guests can also use sport facilities at the University at an extra charge. The Campus is located 30 minutes by car from Barcelona’s El Prat Airport. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the nearest FGC train station, Bellaterra.

name: Oriente Atiram
description: Centrally located, Oriente Atiram allows for easy access to Barcelona's main tourist and retail hot spots. It also offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. This modern hotel provides a concierge, luggage storage and bicycle rental. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace offers a nice place to relax. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the best of the local nightlife. The rooms are air conditioned and include blackout curtains, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room safe, a desk and an in-room closet. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. A wide choice of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. Attractions close to Oriente Atiram include Palau de la Musica Catalana, the Picasso Museum and Placa de Catalunya. It is within a 20-minute walk of Sant Antoni Metro Station and Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which allows easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel
description: Welcome to the first Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants in Spain. Located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter Kimpton Vividora Hotel is a relaxing escape and vibrant hub for locals and travelers alike. The hotel sits right next to Las Ramblas and is within walking distance of the Barceloneta beach. An ideal location with other nearby attractions that include the city’s shopping epicenter and the Gothic Cathedral. Tucked away on a pedestrian street in Barcelona’s city center, our lifestyle design hotel is conveniently 20 minutes away from El Prat airport and 10 minutes from both the cruise port and Sants train station. Enjoy sightseeing plans to Sagrada Familia and La Boqueria but also experience authentic Barcelona by walking the streets of the city. The accommodations accentuate the Mediterranean and contemporary design combined with luxurious comforts, superlative service and standout amenities. Join us at our evening social hour, discover the city with our complimentary bikes and longboards and taste local gastronomy at our Fauna restaurant, Got Coffee & Cocktails or Terraza de Vivi. Don't leave your furry friend at home because we're a pet-friendly hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Ohla Barcelona
description: Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic centre, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas. Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter. Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialised in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar. The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna. The Ohla Barcelona is 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

name: Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona
description: Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning. Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available. The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

name: Hotel Concordia Barcelona
description: Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium. The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning. Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities. The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available. Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Derby Barcelona
description: Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access. The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar. Drinks and light meals are served in the Derby’s coffee shop, The Times. L'Illa Shopping Centre offers a range of restaurants. Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

name: Hotel Arts Barcelona
description: Hotel Arts Barcelona is a landmark with perfect credentials as a premier destination within a destination. An urban resort that stands as the tallest hotel on the coast, overlooking the beachfront offering panoramic city and beach views. The hotel effortlessly combines tranquility and genuine luxury with individual and personalized service provided by a well-connected and passionate team. Offering panoramic city and beach views, the guestrooms, suites and luxury, serviced penthouses are light-filled, luxuriously comfortable.Gastronomy is an inherent part of Hotel Arts Barcelona offering five gastronomic restaurants and a cocktail bar. The hotel has a unique collection of open and leisure spaces exceptional in Barcelona. The artfully designed Infinity Pool and family pool overlook the gardens, offering an oasis of calm by day and vibrant hot spot at night. 43 The Spa, located on the 43rd floor, floating high above the city, captures organic luxury and a sense of well-being.Marriott

name: Sixties Ramblas
description: Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony. Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table. The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbour or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes. Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
description: Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi. The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport. All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail. Do you already know the Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner. The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology. This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

name: Pestana Arena Barcelona
description: Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access. Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings. Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro. Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

name: ABaC Restaurant Hotel
description: Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam. La Pedrera is 3.3 km from the hotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
address: Carrer de Deu i Mata 69-99, 08029 Barcelona
description: Created by Pritzker prize-winning architect Rafael Moneo, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza exudes calm elegance. A 15-minute drive from the city center, it is situated in the Les Corts financial district of Barcelona. This is the perfect choice for business travelers, with the Axa Auditorium right next door. Landmarks, such as the FC Barcelona Camp Nou is also close by. NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has 308 rooms, including 7 Junior Suites and 1 Suite. Each has flat-screen TVs, a Nespresso machine and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy contemporary design with polished wood, glass and large windows, along with modern comforts, such as a rain-effect shower and a pillow menu. Breakfast will be the perfect start to your day with a large spread of options, including eggs prepared-to-order and gluten-free dishes. Lunch and dinner can be enjoyed at GoXO Restaurant and accompanied by a cocktail. Enjoy these on a beautiful terrace. For business travelers, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza is the perfect choice, with 11 rooms holding up to 800 guests. To unwind, head to the outdoor 7th floor pool or visit the fitness center and the spa.NH Hoteles

name: Grums Hotel & Spa
description: The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away. Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout. All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities. The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

name: Sunotel Central
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 570, 08011 Barcelona
description: Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast. The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
description: Occidental Barcelona 1929 is situated in Barcelona and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Placa d'Espanya. There are a range of facilities available to guests of the hotel, such as a seasonal swimming pool, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. Occidental Barcelona 1929 has 152 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Barcelona's attractions, such as Magic Fountain of Montjuic, are within easy walking distance of Occidental Barcelona 1929. Espanya Metro Station is right next door, connecting guests with the local area.Revato

name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero
description: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop. There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods. All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

name: H10 Universitat
description: Centrally located, H10 Universitat Hotel allows for easy access to Barcelona's popular retail areas and tourist attractions. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the lounge bar. Complimentary wireless internet is provided for guests who want to stay connected while travelling. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms provide a desk, a mini bar and an alarm clock. They all have a telephone, heating and a radio. To ensure the day gets off to a great start, a buffet breakfast is served every morning at H10 Universitat's restaurant. In the evening, guests can wind down in the cosy lounge bar. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. H10 Universitat Barcelona is moments from Placa de Catalunya. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Barcelona.Revato

name: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona
description: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette. All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk. The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access. The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: Sallés Hotel Pere IV
description: Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour reception. Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast. Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers. The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

name: Gran Hotel La Florida
description: Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa. Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony. Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available. The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: Catalonia Rigoletto
description: The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box. A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work. Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona
description: Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness centre, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service. The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theatre, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas. Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Catalonia Mikado
description: This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi. The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops. The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina. Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

name: Hcc St. Moritz
description: Set in a listed 19th-century building and 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, the St. Moritz offers stylish accommodation. It features modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and LCD satellite TV. The Hotel HCC St. Moritz maintains its original central staircase and marble reception. Its rooms offer simple, classic décor with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, slippers and toiletries. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily, and you can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes for dinner in the St Gallen Restaurant, where menus use fresh, seasonal produce. Passeig de Gràcia and its Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are one stop away. Barcelona Port is just over 1 km from the St. Moritz.

name: H10 Itaca
description: H10 Itaca is within 10 minutes’ walk of Sants Train Station, the AVE High-Speed Railway, Plaza España and the FIRA Exhibition Centre. It features a stylish 700 m² terrace with a plunge pool. Each bright room at this modern hotel includes free Wi-Fi, a safe, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a desk. They all have a private bathroom including a hairdryer and Textures Collection amenities. Barcelona city centre, including Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro, and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is just 2 stops away. Sants Station runs local and national rail services, including the airport train and the AVE link to central Madrid. Hotel H10 Itaca offers a free welcome glass of cava for all guests. The hotel features a smart restaurant serving signature cuisine and you can enjoy a drink in the chic lobby. The relaxing terrace features sofas and comfortable chairs set under parasols, ideal for enjoying a cocktail. The Itaca also features a fitness room and a sauna. There is a business corner open 24 hours a day. Free national and international newspapers are provided.

name: Vincci Mae
description: Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain. Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property. An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday. Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries,and a hairdryer. Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

name: Vincci Gala
description: Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available. The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design. The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar. A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information. Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square. There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas
description: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool. The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property. Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Continental Palacete
description: Stay in the refined elegance of this classic hotel, set in a renovated, 19th-century palace surrounded by classy boulevards right in the heart of Barcelona. As soon as you enter the Continental Palacete you will experience a feel of luxury thanks to the exquisite Baroque decor. This elaborate interior features priceless chandeliers and elaborate frescoes, and combines with modern facilities such as free Wi-Fi throughout to provide a unique setting for your visit. Start each day with a delicious hot and cold breakfast. The Hotel Continental has a varied food and drink buffet on offer throughout the day and evening. The hotel lies on the elegant Rambla de Catalunya, just a 5-minute walk from the citys main square of Plaa Catalunya. The surrounding streets are full of Barcelonas distinctive architecture, smart restaurants and exclusive boutiques.iHotelier/iStay

name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
description: Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes. The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo. Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available. You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

name: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel
description: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel is a modern base when in Barcelona and is close to everything the area has to offer. Some of the popular facilities at this elegant 4-star hotel include a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Couples on a romantic getaway will delight in the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, an in-room safe and a desk. They are all soundproofed and include heating. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel's on-site restaurant offers Spanish-inspired dishes, which can enjoyed on the outdoor terrace. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel is also located near the area's popular restaurants and bars, plus EAE Business School is a 10-minute walk away. It is within a 20-minute walk of Sants Estacio Railway Station and Barcelona Sants Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Ronda House
description: Ronda House is set just off Ronda Sant Antoni Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. This hotel has a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. The Ronda features bright, simple décor. Its air-conditioned rooms have fully equipped private bathrooms. A daily buffet breakfast is served in the Ronda’s café which includes a variety of coffees and pastries. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and the bar. The MACBA Art Gallery is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sant Antoni Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s Sagrada Familía and Casa Batlló in less than 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Casa Bonay
address: Gran Vía de Les Corts Catalanes 700, 08010 Barcelona
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. It also offers a coffee bar, a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Casa Bonay features a 24-hour reception, plus a sun deck and live music. For added convenience, it offers a roof garden, a shuttle service and a safe. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a rain shower and a mini bar. All have movies-on-demand, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests of Hotel Casa Bonay can enjoy a unique dining experience at the trendy bar and trendy bistro. Dining options at the hotel include Satan's Coffee and Chiringuito. Those staying at the property can also sit down to a buffet breakfast every morning. Local attractions close to Hotel Casa Bonay include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Placa de Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia. It is within a 20-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia Train Station and Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which allows for easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Catalonia Park Putxet Hotel
description: Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout. The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer. You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available. The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

name: Wittmore Hotel - Adults Only
description: Offering wiews to the vertical garden and the patio, The Wittmore - Adults Only is located in Barcelona in the heart of the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each comfortable and quiet room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. The rooms come with a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers, and luxury toiletries. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Also a bar, and a restaurant with a variety of regional dishes and a wide selection of local and international wines and cocktails. There is a rooftop terrace that features a plunge pool, solarium, and terrace bar. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Plaza Reial is 400 metres from The Wittmore - Adults Only, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Olivia Balmes Hotel
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Olivia Balmes Hotel is set 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, in the elegant Eixample neighbourhood. The modern hotel features stylish air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant. Each bright spacious room includes free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV and a laptop safe. The contemporary bathrooms have an open-plan design. The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Olivia Balmes offers a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. There is also a bar, serving cocktails and snacks, as well as several meeting rooms. Olivia Balmes Hotel has private parking and Barcelona Airport is around 20 minutes’ drive away. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and you can reach Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within a 5-minute walk.

name: Hotel Colón Barcelona
description: Located right opposite Barcelona Cathedral, this grand, neoclassic hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free WiFi, and some rooms have excellent views of the cathedral façade. The stylish air-conditioned rooms at the Colón Hotel Barcelona have satellite TV and a minibar. There is a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Superior rooms also have a Nespresso coffee machine. The hotel boasts an outdoor terrace café in the square, facing the cathedral. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Catalan cuisine and international dishes, and room service is available. Guests can also enjoy the roof-top terrace with views of the cathedral There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Isabella's House
description: Set in Barcelona, 3 km from La Pedrera and 3 km from Sants Railway Station, Isabella's House offers a restaurant, city views and free WiFi. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Camp Nou is 3.1 km from the aparthotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Isabella's House.

name: Casa Camper Barcelona
description: The stylish Casa Camper Barcelona boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, between Las Ramblas and MACBA art gallery. Each room has a separate lounge, and there is a free 24-hour buffet. Casa Camper Barcelona's designer bedrooms overlook either a peaceful vertical garden or city views. The lounges have a flat-screen TV, a sofa and a desk. All rooms have free WiFi. The 24-hour snack area includes free water, soft drinks and coffee, as well as sandwiches, salads, soup, sliced fresh fruit and desserts. Casa Camper Barcelona’s well-known restaurant, Dos Palillos, offers Asian tapas. Casa Camper Hotel Barcelona is located just a 5-minute walk from the famous Boqueria market, the Liceu opera house and the city's famous Gothic Quarter. Plaza Catalunya and the main shopping streets are just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
description: Situated in Barcelona’s modernist district on Passeig de Gràcia, Sir Victor's rooms and suites are inspired by the Catalonian lifestyle of sun, sea, and style. A state-of-the-art spa, two restaurants, a speakeasy-style bar, two meeting rooms, a library, and a sensational rooftop pool and terrace bar overlooking major historic buildings round out offerings that attract locals and travelers alike. The rooms are designed with an emphasis on comfort and nature, while the artwork features local standouts, such as Antoni Muntadas and Alfons Borrell.Marriott

name: Hotel Roger de Lluria Barcelona
